  • void Update ()
    When an ANSI C kernel function which inserts TPixelGroup structures into the TPixelGroups structure on its own, call this function to update the m_pCGroups member in this class.

  • void AddGroup (const CPixelGroup &PixelGroup)
    The PixelGroup parameter is added to this class.

  • bool InsertGroupInGroups (const CPixelGroup &PixelGroup, unsigned int Index)
    Inserts PixelGroup at given Index.

    Removes a CPixelGroup from this CPixelGroups class.

  • bool RemoveGroupSlow (unsigned int GroupIndex)
    Same as RemoveGroup, but the ordering of the groups is preserved.

    Returns the index in which the given position were found, position index also returned.

    Returns the index in which the given position were found, no position index is returned.

    writes all the pixel groups information to stream

Detailed Description

CPixelGroups contains several CPixelGroup classes, last updated 2/7/2001.

Keeps track of more than one pixel group (CPixelGroup). Most images consists of more than one pixel group so this structure is indeed useful.

This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

See also:
CPixelGroup
Version:
1.33, by edr@mip.sdu.dk
Author:
René Dencker Eriksen

Member Function Documentation

bool ipl::CPixelGroups::AddColors (  const CStdImage &    Source ) 
 

After the creation of groups contained in CPixelGroups this method will get the original pixel colors from given source image and insert them into all the groups contained in CPixelGroups.

Parameters:
Source  Image to get the original pixel values from. The PixelGroups positions must be derived from this image.
Returns :
False if the CPixelGroups structure contains no groups or one of the parameters is a NULL pointer.

Definition at line 181 of file pixelgroups.cpp.

References ipl::CStdImage::GetConstTImagePtr().

void ipl::CPixelGroups::AddGroup (  const CPixelGroup &    PixelGroup ) 
 

The PixelGroup parameter is added to this class.

Note: All memory allocated in the PixelGroup class parameter is copied to a new structure, you must remember to free the memory in PixelGroup.

Parameters:
PixelGroup  PixelGroup to be added.

const TPixelGroups * ipl::CPixelGroups::GetConstTPixelGroupsPtr (    )  const
 

To use the kernel C functions it is sometimes necessary to pass the TPixelGroups structure.

In other cases do not use this function to manipulate the pixel groups but use the methods in this class!

Returns :
pointer to pixel groups data

CPixelGroup * ipl::CPixelGroups::GetGroup (  unsigned int    Index )  const
 

Returns a pointer to the group at given index.

All changes made to the contents of this pointer affects the group stored in this class.

Parameters:
Index  Group to access.
Returns :
A pointer to the group at "Index", NULL if out of range.

bool ipl::CPixelGroups::GetGroupWithPos (  unsigned int &    GroupIndex,
const CPoint2D< INT16 > &    Pos
) 
 

Returns the index in which the given position were found, no position index is returned.

See also other method where position index is returned.

Parameters:
GroupIndex  The first group index in which the position Pos were found. Unchanged if position was not found.
Pos  Position to test for.
Returns :
true if the position was found, false if not found.

bool ipl::CPixelGroups::GetGroupWithPos (  unsigned int &    GroupIndex,
const CPoint2D< INT16 > &    Pos,
unsigned int &    PosIndex
) 
 

Returns the index in which the given position were found, position index also returned.

See also other method where position index is returned.

Parameters:
GroupIndex  The first group index in which the position Pos were found. Unchanged if position was not found.
Pos  Position to test for.
PosIndex  If the position "Pos" is found, the PosIndex of the position is returned in this parameter. If not found, the parameter is unchanged.
Returns :
true if the position was found, false if not found.

unsigned int ipl::CPixelGroups::GetTotalGroups (    )  const
 

Returns the total number of groups contained in this class.

To iterate through all groups use indexes from 0 to GetTotalGroups()-1.

Returns :
Total groups.

Definition at line 156 of file pixelgroups.h.

bool ipl::CPixelGroups::RemoveGroup (  unsigned int    GroupIndex ) 
 

Removes a CPixelGroup from this CPixelGroups class.

Done by moving the last group in the pGroups array contained in the m_Groups member to the index which is to be removed. All memory allocated for the group to be removed are freed. Note: When removing an element at index GroupIndex in a loop which runs through all indexes, remember to iterate at GroupIndex again. Otherwise you will miss a group!

Parameters:
GroupIndex  Index of group in the m_Groups member of type TPixelGroups.
Returns :
False if GroupIndex is out of range

Definition at line 193 of file pixelgroups.cpp.

bool ipl::CPixelGroups::RemoveGroupSlow (  unsigned int    GroupIndex ) 
 

Same as RemoveGroup, but the ordering of the groups is preserved.

This function is slower than RemoveGroup.

Parameters:
GroupIndex  Index in the array of groups to be removed.
Returns :
False, if Index is out of range.
